segments.advisor_message: So, uh, could you tell me about your current health, like, how are you feeling these days?
segments.client_message: Well, I guess I'm okay but, y'know, mostly I just get tired a lot. Not great, uh, but not terrible either.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, and uh, are you, like, smoking at all?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I smoke, um, about ten cigarettes, I think, like every day for, like, uh, five years.

segments.advisor_message: Okay. And, do you have a will or any, like, power of attorney stuff set up?
segments.client_message: Um, I don’t think I got a will yet and, uh, no power of attorney either.
